tasks.task: Unloading a combine machine from a truck
subtasks: Drive the truck to the farm
Position the truck next to the storage area
Open the combine machine's protective cover
Carefully lower the combine machine from the cargo hold
Secure the combine machine in the storage area
Remove any protective covers or gear
Check functionality of machine components
Lubricate or adjust moving parts
Inspect for any damages or issues

tasks.task: DM Vanderbilt leaves peppers pile on ground after combine
subtasks: Identify the need to discard some produce
Decide on the quality of produce as it falls from the combine
Separate damaged or unsuitable peppers from the pile
Possibly report issues with the combine's collection system

tasks.task: Driving the combine through a pepper patch
subtasks: Adjust the combine's height to match the crop's growth
Start the combine's engine
Operate the combine's machinery to harvest peppers
Monitor the operation of the combine's collecting drum
Navigate through the rows of peppers without damaging plants

tasks.task: Removing harvested peppers from the combine
subtasks: Stand beside the combine to receive the harvested peppers
Catch the peppers as they fall from the combine
Possibly sort the peppers as they are unloaded
Tamper-resistant pile on a flat ground
Possibly cover the pile with a tarp
Lifting and squeezing the pineweed
Possibly dropping or throwing the pineweed
Walking between rows to check soil moisture
Inspecting for pest or disease issues
Noting weather conditions that might affect the crops
Determining the need for fertilizer based on soil test results
Mixing the fertilizer with water or dry application
Distributing the fertilizer evenly across the fields
Monitoring the effect of the fertilizer on crop growth
Checking the irrigation pipes for leaks or damage
Adjusting sprinklerheads or nozzles
Starting the irrigation system
Monitoring water distribution across the fields
Inspecting the combine's hoses and connections
Tightening any loose connections
Ensuring proper sealing of all components
Position the grain cart near the combine
Connecting the grain cart to the combine
Secure the connection to prevent accidental disconnection
